cast.overview: Fast Eddie Felson is a small-time pool hustler with a lot of talent but a self-destructive attitude. His bravado causes him to challenge the legendary Minnesota Fats to a high-stakes match.
cast.title: The Hustler

details.biography:
Sid Raymond was born on January 21, 1909 in New York City, New York, USA as Raymond Silverstein. He was an actor, known for Two Much (1996), The Baby Huey Show (1994) and The Funhouse (1981). He was married to Dorothy Naftel. He died on December 1, 2006 in Aventura, Florida, USA.

Is best known as the voice of "Baby Huey" and "Katnip"
details.name: Sid Raymond
details.place_of_birth: New York City, New York, USA
